definition: to slide/sliding movement
surname Hua
to slip/to slide/smooth/slippery/cunning
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
strike-slip fault (geology)/fault line where the two sides slide horizontally past one another
pinyin: zou3 xiang4 hua2 dong4 duan4 ceng2

sentences.english: You swipe up and down to scroll lists of, say, tracks or artists.
sentences.chinese: 你可以上下滑动来滚动列表，比如，艺术家列表。

sentences.english: When I click another tab, the content literally glides to it.
sentences.chinese: 当我单击另一个选项卡时，内容便逐字地向其滑动。

sentences.english: Griffins now sometimes glide rather than always flapping their wings.
sentences.chinese: 新来者现在有时滑动不愿总是拍打他们的翅膀。

sentences.english: Various shortcomings existed for the adoption of slide bearing in the ball mill was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了球磨机采用滑动轴承存在摩擦阻力大的弊端。

sentences.english: It slides up and down my heel when I walk around.
sentences.chinese: 当我走动时，它就在我脚跟上下滑动。

sentences.english: The inside and outside of the vessel were smoothed and red ochre slip was applied.
sentences.chinese: 内部和外部的船只进行平滑和红色赭石采用滑动。

sentences.english: Slides easily up the rope and jams when the cam is loaded.
sentences.chinese: 防坠器向上滑动自如，而向下受重时凸轮会制停。

sentences.english: Drag or slide cylinders, even for short distances.
sentences.chinese: 拉拽或滑动钢瓶，即使是很短的距离。

sentences.english: Conclusion Sliding graft was a safe and effective method in treating traumatic tibia nonunion.
sentences.chinese: 结论滑动植骨是治疗创伤后胫骨干骨不连的有效方法。

sentences.english: The value the slider shows. This determines the position of the draggable thumb.
sentences.chinese: 滑动条显示的值，这个确定拖动滑块的位置。

sentences.english: The external cutter slips over the fish or tubing to be cut.
sentences.chinese: 外割刀在准备要割断的落鱼或油管上滑动。

sentences.english: It comes with extra-deep and wide pattern to reduce sliding, enhance stability and increase traction force.
sentences.chinese: 其超深宽花纹可减少滑动，增加稳定性和牵引力。

sentences.english: Plate_bending element_free method, which is based on the moving least squares (MLS) interpolants, is studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 针对基于滑动最小二乘法的板弯曲无单元法进行研究。

sentences.english: Slide and tap in reservoir retainer clips until tab locks to housing.
sentences.chinese: 滑动并敲击贮油槽扣件夹，直至凸耳锁紧外壳。

sentences.english: A brake valve tube is glidingly connected and sealed with the upper cover by adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 制动阀管与上盖间为滑动配合连接，并以粘合剂密封。

sentences.english: Private space is enclosed by flexible sliding bamboo doors.
sentences.chinese: 私密空间采用了可以滑动的竹门。

definition: to drag/to tow/(computing) to drag (mouse operation)
push button
to rotate/to revolve/to spin/to whirl
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
to turn sth around/to swivel
to roll/to turn over/to invert/to flip
to roll/(to do sth) in a loop/to scroll (computing)/to progressively expand (economics)/to rumble (of thunder)
to press down/to press a button
button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
to pull out/to pull a lever
to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
to pull/to drag/to haul
to stir/to prod/to poke/to move sideways/to strum (on a guitar etc)
to sway/to rock
key (on a piano or computer keyboard)/button (on a mouse or other device)/chemical bond/linchpin
to slide/to coast/to glide/(of an aircraft) to taxi
tactile sensation/touch/feel
